alert.note: Alert for Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 8:56AM MST until February 28 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches except up to 1 inch additional snow accumulation Coeur d`Alene area. * WHERE...Coeur d`Alene, Fernwood, Sandpoint, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Eastport, Priest River, Newport, Athol, Deer Park, Orin-Rice Road, Wallace, Dobson Pass, Fourth Of July Pass, Osburn, Chewelah, St. Maries, Kellogg, Metaline, Clark Fork, Bonners Ferry, Northport, Colville, Mullan, Pinehurst, Metaline Falls, Kettle Falls, Ione, Worley, Hayden, Post Falls, Tiger, Springdale-Hunters Road, Flowery Trail Road, Fruitland, and Lookout Pass. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Panhandle Mountains; Coeur d'Alene Area; Northern Panhandle
